thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Michael Emmanuel
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Michael Emmanuel

author: Michael Emmanuel
title: Michael Emmanuel
text: This is the fourth time we have rented from Omega in Christchurch. This year we had the car for 7 weeks. Although their cars are not new ones we have not had any problems and we always find them very helpful and courteous. Their prices are always fair and we will no doubt use them again next time we are in Christchurch.
